changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds the module workplan:panel to Results entry role

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextVal( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_role where name = 'Report Admin' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'AuditTrailView' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Rolls back the change from above and adds the AuditTrailView to a new Role

delete.where: system_module_id = ( select id from system_module where name = 'AuditTrailView' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_role_seq' )

column.name: description
column.value: Able to view the audit trail

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextVal( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_role where name = 'Audit Trail' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'AuditTrailView' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds new mapping to analyzer test map table

column.name: analyzer_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.analyzer where name = 'Cobas Taqman' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Viral Load' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds a CobasTaqman DNA PCR role and matches it with the module

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_role_seq' )

column.name: description
column.value: Able to enter results for Cobas Taqman DNA PCR

column.name: grouping_parent
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.system_role where name = 'Virology automatic' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextVal( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_role where name = 'CobasTaqman DNA PCR' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'AnalyzerResults:cobasDBS' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'LogbookResults:chem' )

changeSet.author: paulsc

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from clinlims.test_reflex where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Bioline' ) ;

changeSet.comment: Rerunning the insertion of Bioline reflexes. They are in the log but not in the db Go figure

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Bioline' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Bioline' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'HIV1' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Bioline Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status HIV 1' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Bioline' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Bioline Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status HIV 2' )
